project.name: POM Manipulation for Maven Extension
project.description: Manipulation Tool (available as library, extension and CLI) for Apache Maven that allows pre-processing of Maven pom.xml's.

requireMavenVersion.message: To build this project Maven [3.3.9,)(or greater) is required. Please install it.

requireJavaVersion.message: To build this project JDK 1.8 (or greater) is required. Please install it.

requireMavenVersion.message: To build this project Maven [3.3.9,)(or greater) is required. Please install it.

requireJavaVersion.message: To build this project JDK 1.8 (or greater) is required. Please install it.
